Coco Fiber

Coco Fiber, also known as coconut fiber, is a versatile material derived from the natural processing of coconut husks. As an eco-friendly product, Coco Fiber is renowned for its exceptional strength and high resistance to moisture and decay. In various industries, Coco Fiber is widely used for multiple purposes, from the production of ropes and mats to an effective growing medium that supports optimal plant growth.

With its durable nature and excellent water absorption capacity, Coco Fiber is the ideal choice for agricultural and horticultural needs, providing a natural solution that is both efficient and sustainable.
